All Is True

Ano: 2018

IMDb ID: tt9206798

Classificação: 6.3

Sinopse: On 29 June 1613 in London, the Globe Theatre, run by famous playwright William Shakespeare, accidentally burns to the ground. Seriously affected, he stops writing and returns to his hometown, where his wife Anne and daughters Judith and Susanna are surprised to hear that he intends to stay there definitively, after two decades working in the capital, neglecting his sincere affections for them.
